title: The Dangerous Days of Kiowa Jones

sources.title: The Dangerous Days Of Kiowa Jones (1966)
sources.description: A dying marshal deputizes a drifter to deliver the two killers in his custody to prison. However, the new deputy must elude a pair of bounty hunters who want to deliver the prisoners themselves to collect the reward and would think nothing of killing the deputy to get them.

metadata.Plot: A dying marshal deputizes a drifter to deliver the two killers in his custody to prison. However, the new deputy must elude a pair of bounty hunters who want to deliver the prisoners themselves to collect the reward and would think nothing of killing the deputy to get them.
metadata.Writer: Clifton Adams, Frank Fenton, Robert E. Thompson
metadata.Actors: Robert Horton, Diane Baker, Sal Mineo
